title: Shenandoah National Park: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       What's the Best Way to Stay Connected? Shenandoah National Park provides a few different ways for you to stay connected to what is happening in the park. These options allow for maximum efficiency and allow you to choose how you want to be informed, and how often you want to be informed.  Twitter Follow @Shenandoahnps on Twitter and receive tweets from us to your desktop, smart phone or other hand-held device. It's a great way to stay in touch while traveling. We also often tweet about events that happen "right now," including photographs. Facebook "Like" Shenandoah National Park on Facebook where we share exciting content and happenings in the park. Photographs Do you need a photograph for your news story or other media needs? Check out our Flickr site for free public domain images. Please credit the appropriate photographer and the National Park Service. Video Shenandoah has an extensive video collection available from our Photos and Multimedia page, as well as on on our YouTube site at http://www.youtube.com/user/ShenandoahNPS/videos.
